sense.def:
To prick something
pomeni narediti v nekaj majhno luknjico z ostrim predmetom, na primer buciko.

seg.quote: Prick the apples all over, using the prongs of a fork.
He pricked himself with the needle.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj ostrega
pricks someone
, se človeku zabode v kožo.

seg.quote: ...the sharp pricks as the pellets struck his hands.

sense.def:
Kadar žival
pricks its ears
ali
pricks its ears up
, nenadoma ušesa postavi pokonci, ker je nekaj zaslišala.

seg.quote: He would prick his ears and whine at the sound of my voice.
When a dog hears a strange noise, his ears prick and his head turns.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
pricks one's ears up
, nenadoma začne zavzeto poslušati, ko zasliši nekaj zanimivega ali pomembnega.

seg.quote: ...an argument that made mathematicians all over the world prick up their ears.
